message.content:
cs.DB, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SE, cs.PL 

This paper discusses database replication systems, which are typically studied in the context of database management systems (DBMS). Therefore, cs.DB is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses performance and availability, which are important topics in distributed computing (DC) and distributed systems (DS), respectively. Therefore, cs.DC and cs.DS are also likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses administration, which is a topic in software engineering (SE) and programming languages (PL). Therefore, cs.SE and cs.PL are also possible sub-categories.
